description: Ministry of Labour - Revocation of Order published in Gaz. Ex. No. 1409/14 of 07.09.2005 - Appointed Mrs. N. A. Jayawickrema - Arbitrator - settle the dispute between Mr. K. P. Sarathchandra and 2 others of the one part and Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation - Revocation Order dated 26.07.2012 - Appointed Mr. V. Wimalarajah - Arbitrator to settle the dispute between Mr. I. M. P. Ilangasinghe and Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority - Revocation Order in Gaz. Ex. No. 1750/5 of 19.03.2012 - Appointed Mr. S. Kariyawasam - Arbitrator to settle the dispute between Control Room Operators' Union, Grid Sub section, Ceylon Electricity Board of one part and Ceylon Electricity Board - Revocation of Order dated 09.08.2012 - Appointed Mr. T. E. Santharajan - Arbitrator to settle the dispute between Peoples' Bank Pensioners' Association and Peoples' Bank
